GEMS Changelog¶

Version 0.7¶

  • Added routines for fitting UV-vis spectra.

  • Added menus to GUI for fitting options

  • (lots of) Code cleanup to avoid duplicated code

  • Added ‘About’ dialog in GUI

Version 0.6¶

  • Code cleaning

  • Bug corrected on wrong population calculations

  • new gems.libuk.microstate_population().

  • Improved setup.py

  • Deprecated functions removed from gems.libuk.

  • Added gems.libio.import_numpy() to factilitate type conversion when importing from NumPy arrays.

Version 0.5¶

  • Code cleaning

  • Added option -v for choosing the verbosity of output

  • Added gems.report.minimal_report() for minumum verbosity

  • Added gems.libio.load_file_spectra() for loading spectrophotometric data.

  • updated gems.libio.export_numpy() to used infodict instead of the

    deprecated pre_plotting.

  • gems.report.report_molecule() and gems.report.generate_scheme()

    moved to gems.report.

  • Major internal rewriting of gems.plotter and gems.fit

  • Some functions are deprecated

  • Main script renaming from gems.py to rungems.py

  • Submodule gems.run renamed gems.report

  • Major reorganisation of src folder into module gems and script gems.py

Version 0.4¶

  • Added plot gems.plot_energies().

  • Added Maxima Analysis

  • Removed unnecesary lstsq calls for calculating B-matrix

  • Added GUI with Tkinter. Created gems.gui

  • moved some functions to gems.fit and gems.libio

  • Many long functions split in more comprehensive chunks.

  • Added help menu

  • Added save input and output

  • Added command line option ‘-w’ for saving data as numpy array.

Version 0.3¶

  • Added auxiliary function gems.libuk.num_prot_centres()

  • Improved libuk.error_macro_constants(), gems.libuk.macro_constants() and gems.libuk.conditional_probability2().
